TO

{{doc.salutation}} {{doc.employee_name}}

{{doc.designation}}

Dear {{doc.employee_name}}

Subject: Letter of Increment

This year has been eventful and challenging for all of us. We have been working on the huge challenge of scaling up our business and growing our bottom line.

Consequent to the review of your performance during the period {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.from_date)}} To {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.to_date)}} we take great pleasure to inform that your annual CTC has been increased to RS. {{doc.new_ctc_amount}} the breakup of which is given in Annexure 1, w.e.f. {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.effective_date)}}.

All the other terms and conditions remain unchanged as per your Appointment Letter

We are sure you will make best use of the opportunity offered to you and contribute substantially to the success of our organization as you have done in the past and fully justify the confidence placed in you by the management.

Please sign the duplicate copy of this letter as a token of acceptance of the same.

With Best Wishes,

I have received a copy of this letter and have read and understood its contents.

Name:

Signature:

Date:

Annexure 1

Your revised salary and perquisites will be as under:
